scripts.postinstall: npm run build && gulp link && npm run install-pkg
scripts.install-pkg: npm run install-pkg:core && npm run install-pkg:action-preset && npm run install-pkg:dev-server && npm run install-pkg:create-app
scripts.global-unlink: yarn unlink nickelcat && yarn unlink nickelcat-action-preset && yarn unlink nickelcat-dev-server && yarn unlink nickelcat-create-app
scripts.global-link:action-preset: cd ./dist/action-preset && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link && cd ..
scripts.global-link:dev-server: cd ./dist/dev-server && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link nickelcat-action-preset && yarn link && cd ..
scripts.global-link:create-app: cd ./dist/create-app && yarn link nickelcat && yarn link && cd ..
